'''Treasure Clue (II)''' is a quest item obtained during the Story Quest [[Mystery of the Arcadian Ruins]].

==Text==
She doesn't love him at all.<br />
The passion rushing through the clear spring is just a front.<br />
When she's cold and alone,<br />
her true heart is revealed.
